pr_title: [GEOT-6551] SLD 1.1 doesn't support namespaces in OGC PropertyName

timeline.bodyText: The base class has the namespace support, use it instead of duplicating it. I've added a suggestion to make that field protected in the GeoTools PR.
timeline.author: aaime

timeline.message: [GEOT-6551] SLD 1.1 doesn't support namespaces in OGC PropertyName

timeline.bodyText:
Is this just me, or this assignement became useless?
        this.namespaceSupport = namespaceSupport;
timeline.author: aaime
